title: Hoops Tonight - LeBron & AD shine, Russ "disengaged," Simmons impresses, Nets-Bucks & Wolves-Lakers
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - LeBron & AD shine, Russ "disengaged," Simmons impresses, Nets-Bucks & Wolves-Lakers
description:
First, (3:30)Jason Timpf reacts to the Nets-Bucks and Timberwolves-Lakers preseason matchups. Why is Ben Simmons' recent play encouraging to Jason, and how has Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving's on-court chemistry caught his attention? Later (19:00), Jason discusses LeBron James and Anthony Davis' impressive preseasons, the biggest problem facing the Lakers, and how Russell Westbrook still looks disengaged. #Volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
